• Memory Hierarchy
    • Fast memories are small, large memories are slow
    • GOAL : “size of the cheapest memory, with speed of fastest memory”
    • Principle of Locality
      • Programs use a small part of their memory space frequently
  • Caching
    • Direct mapped, Fully associative, M-way set associative
    • Cache performance
      • Hit vs miss, miss penalty, block size
      • Replacement policy and writing
    • Error checking & Correcting code
      • Parity bit and Hamming code
    • Virtual memory
      • Address Transition, Paging, Page Table, TLB
